Articles.Content:
Hello, every time I run the game and play it for about 10 minutes, it will randomly go crazy and crash. I have to restart my computer after this happens because no other programs will run correctly after this crash occurs. It makes horrible sounds out of the speakers as well.

I am running the lastest version of KSP on an unmodded fresh install.

My specs are:

Windows 10 x64

AMD Phenom II x4 955 3.6ghz

8gb RAM

Nvidia GeForce 660 Ti

128gb SSD

https://www.dropbox.com/s/nemtxbr6mz5q4ox/output_logcrash.txt?dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/zayogvnp92vrxs6/output_logcrash2.txt?dl=0

Plz

Halp me tiny green wizzards

Hi Stopkilling0, does this happen with a new save? You have a few log errors from some vessels in your current save.

If it still happens please use dxdiag to make a hardware report and upload it for us.
